definition: to cut short/to break off/to discontinue/to interrupt
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: Thermal protector in motor will interrupt current when motor overheats .
sentences.chinese: 电机过热时，热保护器将会中断电流。

sentences.english: The water was shut off for several hours while the plumber repaired the pipes.
sentences.chinese: 管子工修理管道时，水的供应中断了几个小时。

sentences.english: Cell phone service was not interrupted outside BART stations.
sentences.chinese: 在站外，手机通讯服务没有中断。

sentences.english: The meeting is disrupted by Albanian irredentist.
sentences.chinese: 会议被阿尔巴尼亚的领土收复主义者所中断。

sentences.english: The one time it is acceptable to swallow an interrupt is when you know the thread is about to exit.
sentences.chinese: 惟一可以生吞中断的时候是您知道线程正要退出。

sentences.english: Owing to the rain, the baseball game was interrupted.
sentences.chinese: 由于暴雨，那场棒球比赛被中断了。

sentences.english: Knowing this ahead of time can help you avoid service disruptions.
sentences.chinese: 提前知道这些信息能帮助您避免服务中断。

sentences.english: Spondylolysis is a break in the pars interarticularis.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎滑脱是峡部连续性的中断。

sentences.english: Then he turned a switch and the voices stopped.
sentences.chinese: 他于是关上电门，说话声音就中断了。

sentences.english: Reef gaps have marked each of the past five major mass extinctions.
sentences.chinese: 礁石中断记录了每一个的过去五年内主要物种的灭绝。

sentences.english: Since that time the industry has never looked back.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起这个行业的发展就没有中断过。

sentences.english: Indicates if the processor is running with interrupts disabled.
sentences.chinese: 表示处理器是否在中断禁用的情况下运行。
他们从内部中断了联系。

sentences.english: We interrupt our programmes for a newsflash.
sentences.chinese: 我们中断节目，插播一条重要新闻。

sentences.english: We are likely to be disconcerted by hiatuses of thought.
sentences.chinese: 我们很可能因思绪的中断而感到困窘。

sentences.english: Sometimes urinates the sudden stop, changes when the body posture can continue to urinate.
sentences.chinese: 有时排尿突然中断，改变体位时才能继续排尿。

definition: to cease/to suspend/to break off/to stop/to discontinue
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
to break/to sever/to turn off (electric switch)
with a grunting sound it stops (idiom); to come to an end spontaneously (esp. of sound)
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
